    #include<bits/stdc++.h>
    using namespace std;
    int main()
    {
    	long long t,n;
    	cin>>t;
    	while(t--)
    	{
    		cin>>n;
    		int r=n%4;
    		if(r==0 || r==1)
    		{
    			cout<<(n/4)*(n/4)<<endl;
    		}
    		else
    			cout<<(n/4)*((n/4)+1)<<endl;
    	}
    	return 0;
    }
